titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3343) to amend the Consumer Product Safety Act and related laws to improve the performance of the Consumer Product Safety Commission, to authorize appropriations for that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1049.

bill.summary: 10/4/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3343 (Consumer Product Safety Commission).
